    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddBooking
    Command to create a new flight booking for a customer.
    AddCustomer
    Command to add a new customer to the system.
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight to the system.
    AddFlightWindow
    GUI window for adding new flights.
    AllTests
    Master test suite that runs all test classes.
    AuthenticationService
    Handles user authentication and session management.
    AuthenticationServiceTest
    Test class for AuthenticationService.
    Booking
    Represents a flight booking in the system.
    Booking.BookingStatus
    Enum representing the status of a booking.
    BookingDataManager
    Manages persistence of booking data to and from files.
    BookingTest
    Comprehensive test class for Booking model.
    CancelBooking
    Command to cancel an existing booking.
    Command
    Interface for all command objects in the system.
    CommandParser
    Parses text commands and creates corresponding Command objects.
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the flight booking system.
    CustomerDataManager
    Manages persistence of customer data to and from files.
    CustomerTest
    Comprehensive test class for Customer model.
    CustomerWindow
    Customer GUI window for the Flight Booking System.
    DataManager
    Interface for data persistence operations in the Flight Booking System.
    DeleteCustomer
    Command to delete a customer from the system.
    DeleteFlight
    Command to delete a flight from the system.
    DeleteFlight.BookingCancellationInfo
    Inner class to track booking cancellation information for rollback purposes.
    DuplicateFlightException
    Exception thrown when attempting to add a duplicate flight.
    Flight
    Represents a flight in the booking system.
    FlightBookingSystem
    Main model class for the Flight Booking System.
    FlightBookingSystemData
    Main data loader and storage manager for the Flight Booking System.
    FlightBookingSystemException
    Base exception class for all flight booking system errors.
    FlightBookingSystemTest
    Test class for FlightBookingSystem.
    FlightDataManager
    Manages persistence of flight data to and from files.
    FlightTest
    Comprehensive test class for Flight model.
    Help
    Command to display help information about available commands.
    ListCustomers
    Command to list all customers in the system.
    ListFlights
    Command to list all flights in the system.
    LoadGUI
    Command to launch the graphical user interface.
    Login
    Command to authenticate and log in a user to the system.
    LoginWindow
    GUI window for user authentication and login.
    Logout
    Command to log out the current user from the system.
    Main
    Main entry point for the application.
    MainWindow
    Main administrative GUI window with full system access.
    Register
    Command to register a new user account in the system.
    RegistrationWindow
    GUI window for new user registration.
    ShowCustomer
    Command to display detailed information about a customer.
    ShowFlight
    Command to display detailed information about a flight.
    UpdateBooking
    Command to update an existing booking.
    User
    Represents a user in the system (Admin or Customer).
    User.UserType
     
    UserTest
    Test class for User model.
    ValidationUtil
    Utility class for validation operations.
    ValidationUtilTest
    Test class for ValidationUtil.
